name: Crazy Miss Hyde
description: Crazy Miss Hyde is a surprisingly balanced hybrid given her name. She is a lively combination of the uplifting, sativa-dominant Belladona and the powerhouse indica Northern Lights. The buds deliver a potent mixture of earthy flavors like menthol and chocolate with a sweet vanilla influence. The effects tend to be focused in the head, with thought provoking stimulation and creativity that can border on anxiety when over-consumed. With the right dosing the indica influence levels out the effects of Crazy Miss Hyde and induces a relaxing sense of euphoria.
attributes_title: Uplifted, Happy, Euphoric, Relaxed, Creative, Pain, Inflammation, Depression, Nausea, Eye Pressure, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Anxious
